Plot: The U.S. government decides to go after an agro-business giant with a price-fixing accusation, based on the evidence submitted by their star witness, vice president-turned-informant Mark Whitacre.
Title: The Informant!
Actors: Matt Damon, Lucas McHugh Carroll, Eddie Jemison, Rusty Schwimmer
tomatoConsensus: A charismatic turn by star Matt Damon and a consistently ironic tone boost this quietly funny satire about a corporate whistle-blower.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 1 win & 17 nominations.
